allOf.description: Structured values are used when the value of a property has a more complex structure than simply being a textual value or a reference to another thing.

saturatedFatContent.description: The number of grams of saturated fat.

fatContent.description: The number of grams of fat.

unsaturatedFatContent.description: The number of grams of unsaturated fat.

sugarContent.description: The number of grams of sugar.

cholesterolContent.description: The number of milligrams of cholesterol.

carbohydrateContent.description: The number of grams of carbohydrates.

proteinContent.description: The number of grams of protein.

sodiumContent.description: The number of milligrams of sodium.

transFatContent.description: The number of grams of trans fat.

fiberContent.description: The number of grams of fiber.

servingSize.description: The serving size, in terms of the number of volume or mass.
